word: IN MANY OF HER MANUSCRIPTS AS THEY COME FROM HER HAND QUOTATION MARKS ARE USED. IN OTHER CASES THEY WERE NOT USED; AND HER HABIT OF USING PARTS OF SENTENCES FOUND IN THE WRITINGS OF OTHERS AND FILLING IN A PART OF HER OWN COMPOSITION, WAS NOT BASED UPON ANY DEFINITE PLAN NOR WAS IT QUESTIONED BY HER COPYISTS AND COPY WRITERS UNTIL ABOUT 1885 AND ONWARD.
